title: Antibacterial efficacy interference of the photocatalytic TiO2 nanoparticle and the lytic bacteriophage vb_EcoS_bov25_1D on the Enterohaemorragic Escherichia coli strain Sakai
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Anita Steinbach, Domonkos Sváb, László Kőrösi, Monika Kerényi, József Kun, Péter Urbán, Tamás Palkovics, Tamás Kovács, Schneider György
